# Publications

```{r load}
library("RefManageR")
source("R/bibstyler.R")
bib <- ReadBib("resources/works.bib")

for(i in 1:length(bib)){
  bib[[i]]$pages <- gsub("(?<!-)-(?!-)", "--", gsub(" ", "", bib[[i]]$pages), perl = TRUE)
  if(!is.null(bib[[i]]$doi)){
      bib[[i]]$doi <- gsub(".*\\.org/", "", bib[[i]]$doi)
    bib[[i]]$url <- NULL
  }
}

```


Number ISI citations: 5,493\
H-index: 41\
Number of papers: `r sum(bib$bibtype == "Article")`\
Number of book chapters: `r sum(bib$bibtype == "InBook")`  

## Journal Articles
```{r papers, results = "asis", eval = FALSE}

papers <- bib[bib$bibtype == "Article"]

NoCite(papers)
PrintBibliography(papers, .opts = list(style = "markdown", sorting = "ydnt", max.names = Inf, no.print.fields = c("number", "eprint", "issn", "isbn")))
```

\* Joint first author

## Book Chapters

```{r chapters, results = "asis"}

chapters <- bib[bib$bibtype == "InBook"]
  
NoCite(chapters)
PrintBibliography(chapters, .opts = list(style = "markdown", sorting = "ydnt", max.names = 20, no.print.fields = c("number", "eprint", "issn", "isbn")))

```


## R packages

```{r packages, results = "asis"}

NoCite(packages)

```
